messages.title: Working for you
messages.content: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Putney.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Labour is a vote to avoid a Tory hard Brexit and to protect jobs, rights and communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting the NHS and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the NHS and social care the money they need.
Labour will invest in homes to rent and buy, building a million new homes in five years.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Putney.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for Labour is a vote to avoid a Tory hard Brexit and to protect jobs, rights and communities.
issues.environment: Labour will fight for a new approach, and a government that will fight climate change and protect people.
issues.health: Our NHS is at breaking point, Labour will give the NHS and social care the money they need.

housing.content: Labour will invest in homes to rent and buy, building a million new homes in five years.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have worked as a doctor for over 20 years. I trained as a consultant at both St George's Hospital and Guy's and Thomas'. I've seen firsthand the effects that this government is having on our NHS. I'll do my utmost to protect our health service.

quotes.text: Our NHS is one of our greatest achievements. Safeguard it with.
The NHS is one of our greatest achievements. Safeguard it with.

images.caption: Dr. Neeraj Patil standing in front of ambulances.
Dr. Neeraj Patil in medical attire with NHS logo.
